param.name: inputStream
param.para: The stream that delivers the content group map XML for reading.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: stream
param.para: The stream that receives the content group map.

param.name: contentGroupMapWriter
param.para: Provides a write-only object model for a content group map.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: The stream that delivers the source content group map XML for reading.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates objects for reading and writing app packages.
